title: Youth Connect
description: Strengthen your friendships with other youth while deepening your connection with God.

title: Jubilant Connect
description: Jubilant Connect promotes a cheerful atmosphere among its members, emphasizing that it is never too late to serve the Lord and discover fulfillment.

title: Gatekeeper Connect
description: Our major purpose is to build a close-knit community of like-minded people by offering a platform for connectivity, skills partnership, and professional development.

title: Couples Connect
description: Couples Connect is committed to strengthening connections among couples, whether they are dating, engaged, or married.

title: Basketball Connect
description: Basketball Connect, an engaging connect group that fosters relationships amongst basketball aficionados in nearby communities.
